Acharya Prashant

language
Article Talk From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Prashant Tripathi known as Acharya Prashant is an indian author and Advaita teacher. He teaches seventeen forms of Gita and sixty forms of Upanishands.
He is founder of a non-profit organization named PrashantAdvait Foundation,
and is a animarl rights activist.

Early life and education

Prashant Tripathi recived his bachelo's degee in engineering from IIT Delhi and
later did post graduation in management from IIM Ahemadabad in 2003. he
worked for Indian civeil services briefly starting as a Vedanta teache and an author.

Reception
